input: Consider the following statement : The charge of violation of the Constitution by the President of India for his impeachment cannot be preferred by a House unless: P. A resolution containing the proposal is moved after a seven days notice in writing signed by not less than 1/4th of the total number of the members of that House. Q. The resolution is passed by the majority of not less than 2/3rd of the total membership of that House. Which of the statements given above is/are correct ?
